channel.title: Idea
channel.description:
Hey , I was just wondering why RS2 has a TuTorial forum , advertisement , development , shouldn't we have a RSC TuTorial forum for the people who actually would like to learn about RSC?
Remember , this is just a suggesstion , don't flame the shit out of me.
~Kyle

item.title: Idea
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

[quote=“i_pk_pjers_i, post:19, topic:226942”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=298232.msg2398172#msg2398172 date=1219272928]
Id be surprised if any code gets added in there. I’d expect a million picture tutorials of how to set up a server.
[/quote]And video tutorials.[/quote]

Remote desktop sessions on how to alter XML files.

Read full topic

item.title: Idea
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I assume the only code-changing tutorials that would be made, are how to change the name of the server, as even that seems to be a little bit too hard for some of these kids.

Read full topic

item.title: Idea
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Its not that rs2 is superior its that its not as popular, even still do you really want rsc private servers to turn out as bad as rs2 servers?
If so, then sure we’ll add a tutorial section and watch these servers get filled with shitty code.

Read full topic

item.title: Idea
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

RSC just is not that superior to rs2 in this board makers view. Judging by popularity of the two, i think its fair to say RSC does not need a few more boards.

Read full topic

item.description:
@extacy wrote:

Jaghetermario:

If anyone should be muted it you (extacy) You really idiot and getting in other ppl bissniZ You got no life so you screwing up other ppl that just trying to make RSC more fun!, so its not me im actuelly TRYING TO LEARN and im helping ppl as much as i can. then you come and destroy thing other ppl build. you are just an nolifer and ppl shouldnt care about what you are saying you dont even shouldnt be able to be on this forum.

Drama is a big nono.

item.title: Idea
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

[quote="~Kyle, post:7, topic:226942"][quote author=Krypton link=topic=298232.msg2395851#msg2395851 date=1219160915]
The reason RS2 has a lot more sections is because RS2 is a lot more active.
[/quote]
That’s my point , I want to see RSC get more active , get more people in the community , etc.
If people start making TuTorials & different things more people will view and maybe come a part of the RSC sections.[/quote]

Masses isn’t always a good thing. Hordes of retards vs a few bright fellows.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Krypton1 wrote:

RS2 is active, but is a LOT of kids that just leech the sources from the download section and host it. RSC is getting a lot to be like that and a lot of people don’t want it to become any worse.
